sortItems.text: Select a mug that you find suitable and that reflects your the complex nuances of your personality. Ensure the mug is clean, whether by hand or by dish-washing machine.
sortItems.altText: Image of a dish washing machine

sortItems.text: Find your preferred coffee machine and rest your mug on the tray, ready to receive your hot beverage.
sortItems.altText: Image of a mug sitting on the tray of a coffee machine

sortItems.text: Make your preferred coffee selection using the machine's human interface (this may be a screen or variety of buttons).
sortItems.altText: Image of the coffee screen interface

sortItems.text: Wait patiently while the inner workings of the machine prepare your coffee and pour it into your mug.
sortItems.altText: Image of coffee being dispensed into a mug

sortItems.text: Remove your mug from the machine and add cream and sugar to taste.
sortItems.altText: Image of the coffee mug with a carton of coffee cream and a container of sugar

sortItems.text: Stir your coffee to ensure the emulsification of your beverage.
sortItems.altText: Image of a coffee mug with a stir stick

sortItems.text: Drink and enjoy your coffee when it is cool enough to consume. Enjoy responsibly.
sortItems.altText: Image of a woman drinking the coffee
